name: drug-data-collection
description: A local application for collecting and managing drug data

scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=test npm run seed && NODE_ENV=test nodemon server.js
scripts.package:mac: mkdir -p dist/mac && cp dist/build/index.js dist/mac/ && cp -r dist/build/build dist/mac/ && cp -r public dist/mac/ && cp .env dist/mac/ && npm run seed && cp abx-data.sqlite dist/mac/abx-data.sqlite && cd dist/mac
scripts.package:win: mkdir -p dist/win && cp dist/build/index.js dist/win/ && cp -r dist/build/build dist/win/ && cp -r public dist/win/ && cp .env dist/win/ && npm run seed && cp abx-data.sqlite dist/win/abx-data.sqlite && cd dist/win && zip -r ../drug-data-win.zip .
scripts.package: npm run build:ncc && npm run package:mac
scripts.nex: cd dist && npx pkg mac/index.js -t latest-macos-x64 --output dist/drug-data-collection-mac
